page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most of the people who live in our survey area who are in work almost certainly travel out of the area to their employment.They will work for the major employers in the area- the engineering companies or the mines. Those who work in the area in which they live would include the farmers and their employees,those working at the Creamery and anybody from our survey area who works at Camborne School.The employment situation has deteriorated considerably in recent years with the cut backs in Mining Engineering affecting many firms and businesses directly or indirectly.
